thread.title: Charles Wheeler

author: Charles Wheeler
title: Charles Wheeler
text: I recently purchased an 8 x 10 floor set and the shipping was fast (a bit pricy, but ok) I put the squares together and it was as simple as setting the square down, lining it up and standing on it to snap it into place. It truly is easy! I love it as I am a mobile photographer and from time to time I need the floor... it is pretty awesome especially on carpet... ;)
